# Iteration 06 — Score & Timer

## Goal

Introduce scoring and a countdown timer.

At the end of this iteration:
- Timer counts down
- Score updates on win
- Timer reaching zero triggers lose condition (log only)
- No screen switching yet

This iteration is about **game values**, not UI flow.

---

## Files Allowed to Touch

- js/score.js (new)
- js/timer.js (new)
- js/main.js (only to import these files)

❌ No HTML changes  
❌ No CSS changes  
❌ No game over screen logic yet
